titleSection.name: V1TFS
titleSection.shortDescription: Links VersionOne Workitems to TFS Check-ins and Builds.

descriptionSection.description: V1TFS links VersionOne Workitems to TFS Check-ins and Builds. The link from Workitems to Check-ins makes it easier to track down the source of a defect and perform code reviews. The link from Workitems to Builds enables teams to measure progress in terms of working software and to identify problems sooner. Using the links from Workitems to Builds, the VersionOne BuildRun Report can help a Release Manager select an appropriate build for release and can be the starting point for release notes.

updates.releaseNotes: Fixed: Performance problems exacerbated by unclosed sprints.

* Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy.
 * Added: Support for TFS 2010 SP1

qualityBands.name: seed
qualityBands.shortDesc: The initial idea of a product. No working code.

qualityBands.name: sapling
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

qualityBands.name: mature
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.

mediaSection.title: TFS Integration
mediaSection.caption: Integrate code check-ins and builds created by Microsoft's Team Foundation Server into VersionOne.
